channel.title: Bob Garner Audio Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Bob Garner
channel.itunes:summary: Personal Success expert Bob Garner provides life-changing information with his free motivational audio podcasts, inspirational podcasts and spiritual podcasts. Bob Garner's message is about helping you change the way you think and create magic in your life. Bob offers two types of free podcasts - motivational and spiritual. The free motivational podcasts provide usable ideas and principles to help you turn your dreams into reality. The focus of the free spiritual podcasts is to amplify your spiritual beliefs, not change them. With a master's in religious studies, Bob Garner is known for his ability to simplify oftentimes complex teachings of New Thought and Universal Law and combine them with the wisdom found in the Bible, the Tao Teh Ching, the Bhagavad Gita and other religious texts. Those looking for Religious Science podcasts, Unity church podcasts, and New Thought podcasts will also discover empowering material.
channel.description: Personal Success expert Bob Garner provides life-changing information with his free motivational audio podcasts, inspirational podcasts and spiritual podcasts. Bob Garner's message is about helping you change the way you think and create magic in your life. Bob offers two types of free podcasts - motivational and spiritual. The free motivational podcasts provide usable ideas and principles to help you turn your dreams into reality. The focus of the free spiritual podcasts is to amplify your spiritual beliefs, not change them. With a master's in religious studies, Bob Garner is known for his ability to simplify oftentimes complex teachings of New Thought and Universal Law and combine them with the wisdom found in the Bible, the Tao Teh Ching, the Bhagavad Gita and other religious texts. Those looking for Religious Science podcasts, Unity church podcasts, and New Thought podcasts will also discover empowering material.

item.title: : Why Am I So Angry?
item.description: Do you know someone who thinks they are a nice and pleasant person, but is actually quick to anger? Are you that way? Learn about diminishing anger on this free motivational audio podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: diminishing anger, how to diminish anger, are you angry, why are you so angry, dealing with anger, free motivational podcast, free spiritual podcast, free motivational podcasts, free spiritual podcasts

item.title: Examining Needs vs Wants
item.description: Before you make your next purchase listen to this free spiritual and motivational podcast on needs vs wants. Do you really need that thing or do you just want it?
item.itunes:keywords: needs vs wants, examining needs vs wants, abundance podcasts, free motivational podcast, free spiritual podcast, free motivational podcasts, free spiritual podcasts

item.title: Overcoming Business Uncertainty and Fear
item.description: More millionaires were made during the "Great Depression" then any time in US history. It was worse then, but today's business "thinks" it's worse. What traits did those millionaires develop then that can help you now. Listen and find out on this free motivational audio podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: millionaires great depression, traits of millionaires, free motivational podcast, free spiritual podcast, free motivational podcasts, free spiritual podcasts

item.title: Give Me Flowers While I'm Alive
item.description: Is it that hard to be kind? Why are some people so ignorant? Learn about being kind to others while that person is alive on this free motivational podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: kindness, being kind to others, why are people ignorant, why are people mean, free motivational podcast, free spiritual podcast, free motivational podcasts, free spiritual podcasts

item.title: The Starfish - It Made a Difference to That One!
item.description: Bob smacks those who don't currently give to charities upside the head. It's not what you did in the past. It's about what are you doing today to relieve the suffering of other people or animals. Bob shoots straight from the hip on this free spiritual audio podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: the starfish story, giving to others, charity podcast, free motivational podcast, free spiritual podcast, free motivational podcasts, free spiritual podcasts

item.title: Communication - Arguing Over a Donkey and Its Shadow
item.description: Aesop shares a story on communication via a donkey and its shadow on this free motivational audio podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: Aesop story, Aesop donkey and its shadow, Aesop the donkey story, improving communication story, free motivational podcast, free spiritual podcast, free motivational podcasts, free spiritual podcasts

item.title: Finding a Hero in Your Mirror
item.description: Ever wonder where all the heroes have gone? Can you still find a hero today? Find out on this free motivational podcast by Bob Garner.
item.itunes:keywords: finding a hero, where have the heroes gone, be a hero

item.title: The Cave of Emptiness and Its Treasure
item.description: Are you willing to give up your old ways, enter the emptiness and find your treasure? Learn how to face the darkness on this free spiritual podcast from Bob Garner.
item.itunes:keywords: how to change your life, improve your relationships, fear of change, free motivational podcasts, story of the cave and its treasure, how to improve your life, get rid of your old ways, change your old ways

item.title: Goals - The Power of Detachment
item.description: Discover the power of detaching yourself from your goals.
item.itunes:keywords: Goals, detaching from goals, achieving goals, how to achieve your goals

item.title: Negative Emotions - Mental Burdens Can Weigh You Down
item.description: Mental burdens of fear, worry, stress and other negative emotions can weigh you down. On this free spiritual audio podcast, discover how you can lighten your load by overcoming negative emotions and achieve peace.
item.itunes:keywords: negative emotions, overcoming negative emotions, negative thinking, diminish fear and worry, stop negative feelings, stop negative thoughts, achieving peace, negative emotions stress, negative emotions quotes, free spiritual podcast, free spiritual podcasts, center for spiritual living podcast, science of mind podcasts, unity church podcasts, free new thought podcasts, religious science podcasts

item.title: Searching for Happiness

item.title: Negative Thought Patterns - Stopping the Negative Mental Movies
item.description: Negative thought patterns can sometimes take the form of negative mental movies. Learn how to control and diminish the negative thinking patterns of mental images. Another free spiritual audio podcast from Bob Garner.

item.title: What a Psychic Taught Me About Success
item.description: In 1978, Bob interviewed a professional psychic for a college course. What this professional psychic taught Bob about success not only added to Bob's life, but can add to yours, as well. Listen to lessons on achieving success from a psychic on this free spiritual audio podcast.

item.title: Dr. Jason Deitch Interviews Bob Garner on Branding, Success, and Becoming an Expert
item.description: Dr. Jason Deitch, Chiropractor and creator of the Discover Wellness Center, interviews Bob. In approx. 60 minutes, Bob answers questions dealing with branding your identity, building a business, becoming an expert, and diminishing lack. Even though the intended audience is chiropractors and wellness center experts, all can learn from this fun and engaging program.
item.itunes:keywords: chiropractor success, branding identity, Jason deitch, become a chiropractor, wellness center podcasts, chiropractor podcasts, success podcasts, discover wellness center, dr. Jason

item.title: Recorded Live at United Center of Spiritual Living - "Where Your Mind Goes, Energy Flows" Part 2
item.description: The 2nd part of this audio program was recorded live at the Church of Religious Science, now known as the United Center for Spiritual Living. What you focus on is what you will create in your life and in this empowering program, Bob shares 3 thought-provoking steps to help you redirect your mind (and energy) toward peace and happiness.
